name: A Light Secret
description:
This game is a school project. 

Contains 1 level.

Story

In this game you play as a little kid who breaks out of a secret laboratory. The kid has been experimented on by evil scientists. Through these experiments he gains the power of light and darkness. Because of this the scientists try to stop this special kid from breaking out with the help of a robot army.

Game mechanics Player

The player can walk, shoot, dash and fire abilities (the aiming is done with the mouse).

It is also possible to switch between light and dark mode (The enemies can only be hit by 1 of the 2 modes).

And the player is able to interact with a few items.

Enemies

There are 3 types of enemies:

The Spincutters try to get up close and do a lot of damage.

The Robo soldiers fire bullets from a distance.

The Rocket bosses fire rockets in a pattern.

Environment

The environment has different effects on the player:

There are pads on the ground that the player can use to heal. 

There are abilities and a key that can be picked up.

The holes in the floor make the player respawn.

The fire and lasers are able to damage the player.
